chapter.title: Understanding JSure Assurance Output
chapter.para:
This chapter descibes using examples the wide variety of messages that appear in the JSure assurance output. The examples used in this chapter can be found in the Eclipse projects contained in ResultsExamples.zip available from the SureLogic web site at http://www.surelogic.com/static/jsure/ResultsExamples.zip. These projects can be added to your workspace
Select File Import… from the Eclipse main menu and then choose General Existing Projects into Workspace for the import wizard.
In the next pane, choose Select archive file:, and then press Browse… to select the Results Examples.zip archive you downloaded.
Select the projects you want to import in the Projects section of the next pane. Press Finish to import and build the projects.
